text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM><TEXT>In dem Brandmüllerischen Buchladen wird ein </TEXT><BIBL><TITLE>Project klugen und verständigen Hauß-Patter, wie auch avelichem Land-Leben</TITLE>, von <AUTHOR>Hiorini</AUTHOR>, welches durch Sub. scriptionen in <VOLUME>2. Folianten</VOLUME> zu <PRIZE>6. fl.</PRIZE> gedrucket wird</BIBL><TEXT>. Ferner ist allda neu fertig worden: </TEXT><BIBL><AUTHOR>Lutheri</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Bibel</TITLE> mit Figuren in <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT></BIBL><TEXT>; Item, </TEXT><BIBL>des Herrn Abbts <AUTHOR>Fleury</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Kirchen-Historien</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> aus dem frantzösischen ubersetzt</BIBL><TEXT>; Item, </TEXT><BIBL><TITLE>die gantze Pflicht des Menschen</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> aus dem Englischen ubersetzt</BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":12,"explanation":"The original XML contained several structural errors and what appear to be optical character recognition (OCR) mistakes. I have made the following corrections: 1. Corrected 6 garbled characters/words, restoring German umlauts and misspelled words (e.g., 'Brandmüllerischen', 'neu', 'zu'). 2. Restructured the first bibliographic entry ('Project von Hiorini'), which had a fragmented title and a misplaced author tag, by consolidating the title and correctly positioning the author element. 3. Added a missing pair of <BIBL> tags to properly enclose the third book advertisement ('Kirchen-Historien' by Fleury). 4. Wrapped four segments of untagged introductory and transitional text in <TEXT> tags to create a more explicit and well-formed document structure."}

parsed.fixed_xml: <ITEM><TEXT>In dem Brandmüllerischen Buchladen wird ein </TEXT><BIBL><TITLE>Project klugen und verständigen Hauß-Patter, wie auch avelichem Land-Leben</TITLE>, von <AUTHOR>Hiorini</AUTHOR>, welches durch Sub. scriptionen in <VOLUME>2. Folianten</VOLUME> zu <PRIZE>6. fl.</PRIZE> gedrucket wird</BIBL><TEXT>. Ferner ist allda neu fertig worden: </TEXT><BIBL><AUTHOR>Lutheri</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Bibel</TITLE> mit Figuren in <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT></BIBL><TEXT>; Item, </TEXT><BIBL>des Herrn Abbts <AUTHOR>Fleury</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Kirchen-Historien</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> aus dem frantzösischen ubersetzt</BIBL><TEXT>; Item, </TEXT><BIBL><TITLE>die gantze Pflicht des Menschen</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> aus dem Englischen ubersetzt</BIBL></ITEM>
parsed.explanation: The original XML contained several structural errors and what appear to be optical character recognition (OCR) mistakes. I have made the following corrections: 1. Corrected 6 garbled characters/words, restoring German umlauts and misspelled words (e.g., 'Brandmüllerischen', 'neu', 'zu'). 2. Restructured the first bibliographic entry ('Project von Hiorini'), which had a fragmented title and a misplaced author tag, by consolidating the title and correctly positioning the author element. 3. Added a missing pair of <BIBL> tags to properly enclose the third book advertisement ('Kirchen-Historien' by Fleury). 4. Wrapped four segments of untagged introductory and transitional text in <TEXT> tags to create a more explicit and well-formed document structure.
